event.title: the time of Ranjit Singh in the early decades

data.event: The area around Roda was settled during the time of Ranjit Singh in the early decades of the nineteenth century.
This happened when Ranjit Singh marched in the area in 1821.

event.title: was assigned to it in Revenue Settlement of 1860

data.event: The name Roda was assigned to it in Revenue Settlement of 1860.
